title: Arabian Nights: Sinbad's Adventures
resume: Arabian Nights: Sinbad's Adventures is a 52 episode anime series directed by Fumio Kurokawa and produced by Nippon Animation which was first aired in 1975. The story is based on the children story "Sinbad the Sailor".
